verses.verse: Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, according to your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>: according unto the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> blot <S%H4229>out<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>.
<S%H3526>Wash<s%> me <S%H7235>throughly<s%> from my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: and my <S%H2403>sin<s%> is ever before <S%H8548>me<s%>.

Against <S%H2398>you<s%>, you only, have I sinned, and <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>: that you might be <S%H6663>justified<s%> when you <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and be <S%H2135>clear<s%> when you <S%H8199>judge<s%>.
<S%H2342>Behold<s%>, I was shaped in <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; and in <S%H2399>sin<s%> did my <S%H517>mother<s%> conceive <S%H3179>me<s%>.
<S%H2654>Behold<s%>, you desire <S%H571>truth<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts<s%>: and in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> part you shall make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
<S%H2398>Purge<s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and I shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: <S%H3526>wash<s%> <S%H3835>me<s%>, and I shall be whiter than <S%H7950>snow<s%>.
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>; that the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which you have <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>.
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins<s%>, and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> all my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
<S%H1254>Create<s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> inside <S%H7130>me<s%>.
Cast me not <S%H7993>away<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence<s%>; and <S%H3947>take<s%> not your <S%H6944>holy<s%> spirit from <S%H7307>me<s%>.
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; and <S%H5564>uphold<s%> me with your <S%H5081>free<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Then will I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%>; and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be converted unto <S%H7725>you<s%>.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, you <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H6605>open<s%> you my <S%H8193>lips<s%>; and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall show <S%H5046>forth<s%> your <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
For you <S%H2654>desire<s%> not <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; else would I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7521>it<s%>: you delight not in burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: a <S%H7665>broken<s%> and a <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, you will not <S%H959>despise<s%>.
Do <S%H3190>good<s%> in your good <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H1129>build<s%> you the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then shall you be <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, with burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H3632>whole<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>: then shall they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> upon your <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
